ingredients: 1 tablespoon butter, 3 cups peeled, sliced carrots,   salt and ground black pepper to taste,   +   1/4 cup orange juice,   +   1/4 cup pomegranate juice
nutrition: Total Fat 3g 4%, Saturated Fat 2g 10%, Cholesterol 8mg 3%, Sodium 84mg 4%, Total Carbohydrate 13g 5%, Dietary Fiber 3g 9%, Total Sugars 8g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 13mg 66%, Calcium 33mg 3%, Iron 0mg 2%, Potassium 325mg 7%
